title: I am paranoic, thats why I'm even making this post
body: Alright this is probably a dumb question but can you get banned for having scripts installed on your computer, so I just lost a game due to an ashe arrow hitting me and I told my 2 brothers "ok fk this ill script" and then they told me not to and I agreed on it. TLDR I installed a scripting software (dont remember name i deleted history and downloaded file) i opened it and then immediately uninstalled, like 5 seconds later. Never got into a game, never actually opened the script like loaded something, but I am still extremely worried since my brothers were shouting at me how they're going to get banned as well if I get banned for "scripting" Please only people of knowledge of this topic respond I'm actually more worried about my brothers' accounts we play on the same pc :( Lol is a big deal for them

replies.body: As long as they are completely removed and you aren't playing with any third-party programs installed, you should be alright.
By the way, I'm never going to ever attempt or even think about doing something like that.
